author: der
msg: Added FAQ on combining custom rules with existing rule sets

author: chris-dollin
msg: Tweaking (since the code now ran *slower*, went back a stage).

author: chris-dollin
msg: More refactoring - get the `find` specification as close as possible to
the pattern creation, so it can be optimised.

author: chris-dollin
msg: Added nonTrivial() to ValuatorSet so we can tell whether or not it needs
to be run. Fiddled with FasterPatternStage so that Pattern.match() does
only the matches it *needs* to, and incorporates the guard - and if the
guard is trivial, omits it entirely.
